# Samantha Steigleder

 

[City Council](https://www.postfalls.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)  
Title: City Council Seat 1  
[Email Samantha Steigleder](mailto:ssteigleder@postfalls.gov)

Term of Office: 2024 through 2027

## Overview

"It's truly a privilege to represent the amazing people of Post Falls in the capacity of City Councilmember to ensure that the voices of current Post Falls residents are heard, understood and acted upon. It is my desire to preserve the goodness and beauty that exists here through honest and truthful interactions with residents, city staff and any entity wishing to affect Post Falls."

Samantha Steigleder was elected to City Council Seat 1 in 2024. She is currently serving her first term on the Council.

Samantha and her husband have three children. Samantha and her family moved to Post Falls in 2018 from rural California. 

Samantha holds a B.S. in Nursing from Westminster College and works as an Emergency Nurse.
